components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

scheduled_maintenances.name: South Africa SMS Carrier Maintenance - Vodacom

incident_updates.body: The Vodacom network in South Africa is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 August 2025 at 14:00 PDT until 13 August 2025 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vodacom South Africa handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 August 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 13 August 2025 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 August 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 14 August 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets when sending via long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboard visualization partner in the US will be conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, August 16, 2025, at 1:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time. The maintenance window is expected to last up to two hours. During this time, there may be intermittent failures when loading Insights Historical Dashboards or performing ETL uploads.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - SoftBank Mobile

incident_updates.body:
The SoftBank Mobile network in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 18 August 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 19 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from SoftBank Mobile Japan handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

18 August 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 18 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT
19 August 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 19 August 2025 at 13:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 September 2025 at 16:00 PDT until 01 September 2025 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures to Twilio United Kingdom mobile phone numbers.
